name: Extract and structure data from documents in Google Drive
description:
Monitor a Google Drive folder for new PDF or image files, and automatically send them to Koncile’s OCR engine for data extraction.
- Specify exactly which fields you want to extract in your Koncile template (e.g. invoice number, dates, amounts, clauses).
- New files are processed in real-time or at regular intervals.
- Get clean, structured data back — ready for reporting, automation, or export to other tools (CSV, Excel, API…).
